markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 17"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Trickster Tengu](/Feats.aspx?ID=2448) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Tengu" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=240" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 59 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You can transform yourself or the bodies of others to express your displeasure. Once per day, you can cast either [_aerial form_](/Spells.aspx?ID=4) or [_baleful polymorph_](/Spells.aspx?ID=17) as a 7th-level primal innate spell. You must take the form of a bird when using this aerial form.
name: Trickster Tengu

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 17" pfs="Standard" > Trickster Tengu Source Ancestry Guide pg. 59 2.0 --- You can transform yourself or the bodies of others to express your displeasure. Once per day, you can cast either aerial form or baleful polymorph as a 7th-level primal innate spell. You must take the form of a bird when using this aerial form.
